descriptionlist.description:
Add pasteboard shortcuts to your keyboard dock!
Supporting notched devices (X,XS,XR,11) running iOS 12-13. Mostly works with iPhone X UI enabling tweak.

Available shortcuts:
-Select All
-Copy
-Paste (limited paste feature on iOS 12 for images)
-Cut
-Undo
-Redo

and long press on
-Select All to select last word
-Cut to delete last word
-Undo to go to beginning of document
-Redo to go to beginning of document

Go to setting page to reorder your shortcuts.
